title: How to write a business letter asking questions only - Quora

response.answer_text: To be honest, were you to write a letter like that? I’m pretty sure your business partner would laugh you all the way out of their office, wouldn’t you think? Your tone would, rather imaginary I suppose, remain high like this? And that would get annoying fast, you see what I mean? Just keep to the actual question you’d like to ask - don’t try to be too clever, please? ;) Also, see what I did there? :D
